Reviews.Title: “Helpful staff”

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel facing requesting 2 connecting door available time passed 1st night split 2nd day possibility connecting door found hotel staff arrange connecting door suprisingly return hotel baggages transfer upgraded pleased remain hotel 4 days

Reviews.Title: “a wonderful hotel”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed valentines day brilliant decision staff friendly helpful food hotel restaurant eaten hotel distance centre shuttle service efficient reliable taxi centre cos 7 pounds clean comfortable warm bathroom february weather wasnt pool imagine summer pool fantastic chill definitely recommed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel to celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary Nov 2011”

Reviews.Content: husband celebrated 50th anniversary friends hotel impressed staff breakfast buffet view desk clerks friendly helpful recommending restaurants arranging free transportation six restaurants free internet available easy drive city little bus returns front door stayed days cruise greek island cruise highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed novotel recent trip istanbul clean breakfast buffet included staff helpful arranged free transportation 6 restaurant night desk clerk personal guide istanbul free internet lobby
